QuestData.Title: Madcap Mayhem
QuestData.Description: There is another task I must ask of you.$B$BThe leader of the woodland sprites is the Shadowfae Madcap.$B$BIf there is trouble brewing, he is the mastermind pulling the puppet strings.$B$BWe do not have time to deal with the sprites' tiresome pranks and insolence. Take out the Shadowfae Madcap, and be quick about it.
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: The leader of the wood sprites. Beware his tricks.
